metadata.title: Tuesday, 4th March, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to establish community farms in Nabwalya Chiefdom in Mpika District, as a mitigation measure to avert hunger caused by human-animal conflict;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether there were any cobalt and titanium deposits discovered in the country, as of May, 2024;
(b) if so, what the estimated quantity of the deposits was;
(c) where the largest concentration of the minerals at (a) were; and
(d) what measures are being taken to enhance value addition to the minerals above.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a higher learning institution in Kasama Central Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) whether the institution at (a) will be a college or university;
(d) what type of programmes will be offered at the institution; and
(e) if there are no such plans, why.
